root.info: Input/output preferences for the ReReMi algorithm.

parameter.name: LHS_data
parameter.label: LHS data filename
parameter.legend: Complete filename for the left hand side data.

parameter.name: RHS_data
parameter.label: RHS data filename
parameter.legend: Complete filename for the right hand side data.

parameter.name: data_rep
parameter.label: Data repertory
parameter.legend: Repertory where the data files are stored.

parameter.name: data_l
parameter.label: LHS data basename
parameter.legend: Basename of the file containing the left hand side data.

parameter.name: data_r
parameter.label: RHS data basename
parameter.legend: Basename of the file containing the right hand side data.

parameter.name: ext_l
parameter.label: LHS data extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file containing the left hand side data.

parameter.name: ext_r
parameter.label: RHS data extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file containing the right hand side data.

parameter.name: NA_str
parameter.label: NA representation
parameter.legend: String representation for missing values (CSV format).

parameter.name: result_rep
parameter.label: Results repertory
parameter.legend: Repertory where to save the results.

parameter.name: out_base
parameter.label: Results data filename
parameter.legend: Name of the file where to store the results.

parameter.name: ext_queries
parameter.label: Queries extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file where to save the queries.

parameter.name: ext_support
parameter.label: Supports extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file where to save the supports.

parameter.name: ext_log
parameter.label: Log data extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file where to save log traces.

parameter.name: queries_named_file
parameter.label: Named queries filename
parameter.legend: Complete filename for the queries with variable names.

parameter.name: series_id
parameter.label: Series ID
parameter.legend: Series ID to replace __SID__ in filenames.

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.label: Logfile
parameter.legend: File to log. + means generate filename from queries output file. - means stdout.

parameter.name: pairs_store
parameter.label: Pairs store filename
parameter.legend: Name of the file where to store initial pairs.
